review: I completely got rid of cable about a year ago, and during my search for a good set-top streaming device, I found this little gadget.  It's not as robust or feature rich as some of the other streaming doodads, but its simplicity is what makes it stand out.Deducted one star simply because you still get the occasional hangup or glitch during playback, but that's par for the course with most similar devices.  Google is constantly updating and improving the device through firmware updates, so I'm pretty confident that it'll get worked out over time.

review: The processing speed of our smart tv is not that great. Chromecast + Note 3 = SWEET!!!! Buy it!!!!! You will love using it. Once you beam to the TV you can continue using your phone or computer!
author: Christina Page

review: I ordered this when it was announced and have used it almost every day since then.  It had some software problems at first and I did notice some burn in but that has been fixed.  I use it mostly to broadcast YouTube videos to the TV, but I also use it on pages with embedded flash.  There is a little lag between the computer and TV when you do that so you want to make sure you go to another tab or close the computer.The setup works flawlessly and once you tell it to cast it automatically switches the TV over to the correct HDMI input.  You then have to manually change the input back when you are done.One thing I really like about the Chromecast is the artwork that it displays if nothing is being cast to it.  I often switch the TV input to the chromecast if I know I'm going to be using the TV later but there is nothing on at the time.  It cycles through some really good photographs and has fixed the burn in issues by moving text around the screen (slowly so you don't notice it).
author: Eric Grant

review: We actually bought this not really knowing what it was.  We thought it could play all phone videos on the TV, but it was actually a youtube video streamer, which of course means you need wifi in the house (something we don't have.)  But for the price, it's a good deal for what it can do.
